author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four persons were injured in a scuffle following a dispute over sharing irrigation water from a channel near Tirumayam on Tuesday.

The source was utilised for supplying water to fields at Arangirampatti and Marungur under turn system. When one of the farmers from Marungur, Palaniappan (44), wanted supply for his fields, K. Rajendran (50), P. Andiappan (47) and Ganesan of Arangirampatti advised him to wait for an hour. But a duel ensued in which deadly weapons were used.

The four were injured and were admitted to the Government Hospital. The police have registered cases based on complaints preferred by Ganesan and Palaniappan under Section 294 b (Abusing at public place), Section 323 (Voluntarily causing hurt) and Section 324 IPC (Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons). No arrest has been made so far.
title: Four farmers injured in scuffle
